rooms.description: An elegant entrance with reception area that adheres to Vastu principles, incorporating natural elements like plants and water features in the design.
A large open space featuring modern furniture, smart lighting and integrated multimedia systems for a contemporary feel. The layout follows central courtyard orientation to enhance natural light.
Adjacent to the living room with views of the courtyard, designed in accordance with Vastu norms for auspicious dining experiences.
A well-equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and open layout. Ventilation and natural light are optimised by strategic placement relative to the courtyard.
A dedicated entertainment room with soundproof walls, modern audio-visual systems, and comfortable seating arrangements; designed with privacy and acoustic optimization in mind.
An open central courtyard fostering natural ventilation, light and a connection to nature, aligning with Vastu principles of energy flow.
Balcony attached to bedroom 1 providing expansive views and fresh air; designed for relaxation and morning activities as per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in closets, ensuite bathroom and a dedicated balcony offering privacy, positioned in the auspicious north-east corner to align with Vastu principles.
Balcony attached to bedroom 2 providing open views; designed to enhance air quality and daylight.
Comfortable secondary bedroom with ample space, positioned in a balanced orientation relative to the central courtyard for natural light.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring ease of access and positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Large windows for natural light with privacy features, designed to enhance interior brightness without compromising security.
Doorways connecting the bedrooms to their respective balconies, ensuring smooth transition and ventilation.
